content.text:
# Draft:High Commission of the Republic of Cyprus in Ottawa

|high_commissioner = Stavros Hatziyiannis
}}
The High Commission of the Republic of Cyprus in Ottawa, Canada is the main diplomatic mission of Cyprus to Canada. The High Commission is located in  Downtown Ottawa.
The High Commission was established in 2016. Prior to the establishment of the High Commission,  Cypriots were represented by the embassy of Cyprus in Washington with the Ambassador of Cyprus to the United States serving as High Commissioner to Canada with dual accreditation.
The High Commission provides business and consular services to Cypriot citizens in Canada. The goals of the mission include strengthening political cooperation between Canada and Cyprus, promotion of Cypriot products and investments in the Canadian market, promotion of Cypriot culture, and supporting Cypriot communities in Canada. The current High Commissioner is Stavros Hatziyiannis who was appointed in 2024.
Past high commissioners
*Dr. Pavlos Anastasiades (2011/05/18-2014/03/14)
*Georgios Chacalli (2014/03/14-2016/03/22)
*Dr. Pavlos Anastasiades(2016/03/22-2022/09/22)
*Georgios Ioannides (2022/09/22-2024/10/9)
*Stavros Hatziyiannis (current)
